strategy: Replace the random forest ensemble with a gradient-boosted tree model (e.g., XGBoost or LightGBM) using a deeper tree structure (max_depth=10), enable subsampling of training data (sample_ratio=0.8), and apply a novel feature selection via recursive feature elimination (RFE) with a linear regression model as the scoring function. Introduce a target encoding with alpha=0.3 to reduce overfitting, and apply a log transformation to the target variable to stabilize variance. Validate using R² threshold of 0.902 with early stopping based on validation loss.
